name: C'est la vie
description:
Game made in 48 hours! Im preparing my game dev portfolio and this is my first project! I hope you like it guys!

The audio is homemade recorded (sorry for that, i'll fix it in late versions)

If there is any bug or problem please comment! 

If you like videogames and videogame design & creation, suscribe to my Youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/gamerevcanal (Spanish)
